sentences.en: Both side inlets have horizontal grills and incorporate impressive fog lamps.
sentences.cn: 两侧进气口的水平烤架并纳入令人印象深刻的雾灯.

sentences.en: But we can incorporate some of their approach which will strengthern our areas of weekness.
sentences.cn: 但是我们可以采纳他们的某些管理方法,以加强我们的薄弱环节.

sentences.en: Design should incorporate provisions to avoid any accidental collapse of a bed full of solids.
sentences.cn: 在设计中应考虑如何避免丰富的固体床层由于意外事故而崩塌.

sentences.en: I will incorporate the new findings in my report.
sentences.cn: 我要把新发现并入我的报告.

sentences.en: In parenting as in all other spheres, we should let go of convenient but false dichotomies — creativity or discipline, freedom or hard work — and aim to incorporate the best of all worlds.
sentences.cn: 育儿和其他所有领域一样，我们应该自信的放手，而且辩证的看待错误──创造性或严守纪律，自由或努力学习──目的是合并全世界的有点。

sentences.en: In this case it is desirable to incorporate additional oxidizer into the composition.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,需要把附加的氧化剂加入配方中.

sentences.en: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.cn: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.en: One way of overcoming this problem is to incorporate logic circuitry.
sentences.cn: 解决这个问题的方法之一是引入逻辑电路.

sentences.en: Our original proposals were not incorporated in the new legislation.
sentences.cn: 我们最初的提案没有写进新的法规。

sentences.en: Paints incorporate with oil.
sentences.cn: 颜料与油混合在一起.

sentences.en: Queensway Quay will incorporate shops, restaurants and other amenities.
sentences.cn: 女王道码头将会融商店、餐馆以及其他生活便利设施为一体。

sentences.en: Some designs incorporate a two - piece bonnet and yoke.
sentences.cn: 一些结构由两件式阀盖和轭架组成.

sentences.en: The agreement would allow the rebels to be incorporated into a new national police force.
sentences.cn: 该协议将允许叛军并入一支新的国家警察部队。

sentences.en: The authorities incorporate environment education into the standard teaching material.
sentences.cn: 当局把环保教育列为标准教材的内容.

sentences.en: The best branding statements usually incorporate figures in dollars or percentages of money, or time that was gained or saved over a certain period.
sentences.cn: 最好的陈述通常混合了美元数目或者是个百分比，再或者是在一个确定的时期能能够节省多少时间。

sentences.en: The new cars will incorporate a number of major improvements.
sentences.cn: 新款汽车会有若干重大改进。

sentences.en: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.cn: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.en: This move empowers us to expand and incorporate larger business development goals.
sentences.cn: 此举赋予我们扩大并纳入较大的业务发展目标.

sentences.en: We had to incorporate the company for tax reasons.
sentences.cn: 由于纳税的原因,我们不得不把那家公司合并了.

sentences.en: We may always incorporate the information into the signal flowgraph.
sentences.cn: 我们总可以把这些信息放入信号流图中去.

sentences.en: We now incorporate this condition into the analysis of the hydrogen atom.
sentences.cn: 现在我们把这个条件用于分析氢原子.

sentences.en: We’ve incorporated many environmentally friendly features into the design of the building.
sentences.cn: 我们在这座建筑的设计中加进了许多环保元素。

words.tran_cn: 合并的；组成法人组织的
公司；合并，编入；团体组织
合并；包含；组成公司（incorporate的过去分词）
合并的；一体化的；组成公司的

trans.tran_cn: 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的

trans.tran_en: to include something as part of a group, system, plan etc

trans.tran_cn: 组成公司，包含，使混合，使具体化
trans.tran_en: to include something as part of a group, system, plan etc
to include something as part of a group, system, plan etc
